snippet: Why is Angela Merkel being nice to the Greeks? As the German Chancellor arrived in Athens on Tuesday for a one-day visit, commentators suggested the answer might lie in domestic German politics.

headline.main: Merkel Reaches Out to Greece With German Voters in Mind
